review: A sharp little device for streaming and computer desktop sharing options. Not a complaint to be found after two months of use.
author: R. Bradley "they call me Claven"

review: I really do love my Chromecast. This is the second I've purchased.  I would like to see them come out with some better apps but for the most part it does exactly what I need which is stream Netflix and Youtube from my PC, tablet or phone to my TV.
author: Christine Koval

review: Love it.  Really changed my TV watching world in one little device.
author: Leticia Villarreal

review: I actually prefer using my Chromecast over similar functions on my Smart TV. Its super simple to use and pretty intuitive. I especially love the Youtube playlist feature (great for entertaining guests).
author: Alan Blashaw

review: This is the best product that Google has ever put out. Great way of getting content from your computer, or mobile device, to your screen with minimal hassle.The ONLY issue I have is that the Chromecast must see the outside internet to be able to stream even local content. For example, if I have sync content locally with Plex, and travel to a hotel, the Chromecast is worthless. I can bring a wireless router for the Chromecast and mobile device to both be on, but since the Chromecast can't see the internet, it no worky.
author: Pat McKay

review: Love it.  So far I have not missed having cable.  This had satisfied my TV watching needs.
author: EnglishTeacher

review: Works seamlessly from my phone or laptop.
